results.overview: Prominent gang leader Cyrus calls a meeting of New York's gangs to set aside their turf wars and take over the city. At the meeting, a rival leader kills Cyrus, but a Coney Island gang called the Warriors is wrongly blamed for Cyrus' death. Before you know it, the cops and every gangbanger in town is hot on the Warriors' trail.
results.title: The Warriors

results.overview: After a mysterious chest opens a gateway through time, teen gamer Jack is transported to an ancient empire terrorized by a cruel barbarian king. Jack will need all of his gaming skills as he battles to defeat the barbarian, protect a beautiful princess, and somehow find his way back home.
results.title: The Warriors Gate

results.overview: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.
results.title: The Warrior's Way

results.original_title: Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell
results.overview: The third thrilling saga of Deathstalker pits him against the evil wizard and ruler of the Southland, Troxartes, and his band of undead warriors. Dashing Deathstalker is entrusted by the beautiful Princess Carissa to protect an enchanted Jewel one of three which together hold the key to the lost city of treasure, Erendor. The missing pair of gems are stashed all too safely in the heavily guarded castle of the wicked Troxartes. His mission clear, Deathstalker rouses his troops and storms the fortress with the power of lightning. And in this fateful battle, one man will survive to witness the magical secrets of Erendor.
results.title: Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell

results.overview: Features the editing and scoring processes, a proposed narration by Orson Welles, and some of the controversies inherent in the film's release.
results.title: The Warriors: The Phenomenon

results.overview: Details the origins of the story, with anecdotes by the cast and crew about how they got involved in the project.
results.title: The Warriors: The Beginning

results.overview: Documents the filming process, along with technical insights by cinematographer Andrew Lazslo.
results.title: The Warriors: Battleground

results.overview: A parody of the big-budget Ridley Scott-helmed sword-and-sandal epic, Gladiator Eroticvs stars Darian (The Erotic Witch Project) Caine in the title role, a fierce Roman soldier who is sold into slavery and forced to fight in the lesbian games (well, maybe "forced" isn't quite the right word). Also starring John (Titanic 2000) Fedele as the Emperor Dickus Minimus (I kid you not) and Factory 2000 regular Misty Mundae as his royal sister, Clitorus, Gladiator Eroticvs offers the same thrills, excitement, slapstick comedy, and girl-on-girl action that you've come to expect from a Seduction Cinema production.
results.title: Gladiator Eroticvs: The Lesbian Warriors

results.overview: Yet another cut and paste classic from the mind of Joseph Lai!
results.title: Platoon the Warriors

results.overview: The kids are going about their lives like other children, at times finding it difficult to control their powers. It is only during a school trip when they run into the mysterious circus performer, Erma , that things start to heat up.
results.title: 3 Bahadur: Rise of the Warriors

results.overview: An examination of the choreographed fight scenes and bizarre costuming.
results.title: The Warriors: The Way Home

results.overview: Four battle-weary Crusaders take on a mission to track down the evil predator who has abducted all the men and children from a devastated village.
results.title: The Four Warriors

results.overview: "The Warriors Spirit" is a movie dedicated to "National Hero in Life and Death" - Hav Hangpan Dada Ashok Chakra of Assam Regiment.
results.title: The Warriors Spirit

results.overview: UFC 39: The Warriors Return was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on September 27, 2002, at the Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Connecticut. The event was broadcast live on pay per view in the United States, and was the first UFC event to be released on DVD.
results.title: UFC 39: The Warriors Return

results.overview: Villagers in a remote district of central China take on a chemical company that is poisoning their water and air. For five years they fight to transform their environment and as they do, they find themselves transformed as well.
results.title: The Warriors of Qiugang

results.overview: UFC 4: Revenge of the Warriors was a mixed martial arts (MMA) event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) on December 16, 1994, at the Expo Center Pavilion in Tulsa, Oklahoma. The event was seen live on pay-per-view, and later released on home video.
results.title: UFC 4: Revenge of the Warriors

results.overview: Pride 10: Return of the Warriors was a mixed martial arts event held by the Pride Fighting Championships. It took place at Seibu Dome in Tokorozawa, Saitama, Japan, on August 27, 2000. The event was called "the best Pride yet" by Stephen Quadros and Eddie Bravo, the American announce team, and featured many memorable fights.
results.title: Pride 10: Return of the Warriors

results.overview: The TARDIS arrives on Earth in a new ice age. The travellers make their way into a base where scientists, commanded by Leader Clent, are using an ioniser device to combat the advance of a glacier.
results.title: Doctor Who: The Ice Warriors

results.overview: In World War II, a tough sergeant is put in charge of a squad of young recruits and assigned to lead them on a mission against the Germans.
results.title: The Young Warriors

results.overview: American soldiers (Tom Selleck and James Whitmore Jr.) must travel behind enemy lines to procure the formula for a deadly Nazi toxin in this World War II adventure.
results.title: The Gypsy Warriors
